Message:
My life has been filled
with nothing but misery
and despair.

When I was a child,
my mother had an affair
and walked out on us.

I was left with my father—
a jobless gambling addict.

Because of him,
the little money I earned
all but disappeared into
the gambling houses.

Today, a group of men
violently open the front door.

They’re debt collectors
who’ve come for my father.

But there was nothing of
monetary value left in
our home.

So they set their eyes on
the next best thing—me.

“There’s a buyer out there
for everything—even a dirty
brat like you,” one man sneered.

His eyes creep up
and down my body,
evaluating its worth.
